synopsis.text: How can Compiler and Assembler, two stunning entities from a two-dimensional realm, protect their cherished Earth and those they hold dear, when their former masters threaten to annihilate it all? Sent to conquer our world, these heroines instead found love and camaraderie with two 3D men, Toshi and Nachi. But now, with only three days left to return to their original dimension, a sinister duplicate is on a rampage, erasing their 2D allies. In a desperate race against time, Compiler must confront her own duplicate in a lethal battle to rescue her friends and safeguard the world she has grown to love. Will Compiler and Assembler triumph over this new adversary and find the happiness they seek with their beloved? Join them in this thrilling adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
